easy.q: I have a tail but no body. I am not a pet, yet I dwell in a pencil. What am I?

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think of a word that gets smaller when you add letters.

hard.q: A box has four corners and holds three shapes: a circle, a square, and a triangle. If you arrange them so every corner touches the edge exactly once, how many corners are used in total?
hard.hint: Count distinct corners along the outer boundary.
